u:update.u:name: GlassFish Extension For JDev
u:update.u:author: ADF-EMG
u:update.u:description: This extension provides menu options that allow you to start/stop/debug and administer a GlassFish server directly from inside JDeveloper. It is based on the source code provided by Shay Shmeltzer @JDevShay from his GlassFish Extension for JDeveloper 11g. Supports Win/Linux/Mac.
